programme.desc: Underlying fears grip adults in a Transylvanian village when new workers get hired for factory jobs.

programme.title: Biosphere
programme.desc: In the not-too-distant future, the last two men on Earth must adapt and evolve to save humanity.

programme.title: What Comes Around
programme.desc: A love affair becomes a menacing game of cat and mouse where nothing is what it seems.

programme.title: Murder at Yellowstone City
programme.desc: Yellowstone City falls on hard times when a prospector is found dead and the sheriff quickly arrests a mysterious newcomer. However, as the brutal murders continue, worried residents prepare for a final showdown that pits neighbor against neighbor.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: A Los Angeles police officer and his K-9 partner try to uncover a vast conspiracy that has a chokehold on the city.

programme.title: Barbarians
programme.desc: Four friends come together for a celebratory dinner party at a country house. However, as the night progresses, dark secrets emerge and unsettling events begin to unfold around them.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: An insight into the world of trauma cleaning through the journey of larger-than-life business owner Sandra Pankhurst and the workers at Melbourne's Specialized Cleaning Services.

programme.title: Sympathy for the Devil
programme.desc: Forced to drive a mysterious passenger at gunpoint, a man finds himself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse where nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: Neighborhood Watch
programme.desc: Believing he witnessed an abduction, a young man turns to his next-door neighbor, a retired security guard, to help him find the missing woman.

programme.title: Inheritance
programme.desc: When Maya learns that her father was once a spy, she suddenly finds herself at the center of an international conspiracy. In her quest for answers, she must travel the globe, mastering her father's skills and unraveling the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Armand
programme.desc: When Elisabeth gets called to a parent-teacher conference, she's presented with scathing allegations that trigger a tangled web of accusations between parents and faculty.

programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: A famed aesthetician faces a new challenge when a rival opens a skin care boutique directly across from her store. Suspecting that someone is trying to sabotage her, she embarks on a quest to unravel the mystery of who's trying to destroy her life.

programme.title: Bloody Axe Wound
programme.desc: In the small town of Clover Falls, Abbie Bladecut navigates the inheritance of her father's real-life slasher business.

programme.title: No Way Up
programme.desc: Trapped underwater when their plane crashes into the ocean, survivors must find a way to escape as sharks start to circle the wreckage.

programme.title: Formuła 1: Grand Prix Wielkiej Brytanii
programme.desc: Dwunasta runda tegorocznego cyklu będzie miała szczególne znaczenia dla Lewisa Hamiltona. Po przenosinach do Ferrari wyniki Brytyjczyka pozostawiają wiele do życzenia, lecz zmagania na legendarnym torze Silverstone mogą się okazać dla niego momentem zwrotnym sezonu. Siedmiokrotny mistrz świata wygrał tu rekordowe dziewięć wyścigów, ostatni z nich w 2024 roku. Było to wówczas jego pierwsze zwycięstwo od ponad 900 dni! Od ponownego przebudzenia Hamiltona bardziej prawdopodobny wydaje się jednak triumf innego z Brytyjczyków - George'a Russella, jego byłego partnera z Mercedesa, lub Landa Norrisa z bardzo szybkiego w obecnej kampanii McLarena. Na Silverstone błysnąć postara się też Oscar Piastri, który mimo delikatnego potknięcia w Grand Prix Kanady pozostał liderem klasyfikacji generalnej kierowców.
